title: Six Steps to a Girl
description: Luke’s father has just died and, while the rest of the family are devastated, Luke himself is unable to grieve. At the funeral Luke sees the beautiful Eve – the perfect distraction from his messed-up family life. There’re two problems though – Eve’s a year older than Luke, and already has a boyfriend. Luke soon despairs of ever getting Eve to notice him. Then he meets Ryan and hears about his ‘Six Steps’ method to guaranteed success with any girl. Luke determines to put it to the test. Step-by-step, he begins to get closer to Eve, but what’s going to happen when her boyfriend finds out? The first book in a captivating romance series, set in a male's perspective.
author: Sophie McKenzie
